column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////My husband and I split the Steak Frites and unlike most restaurants
column2: it was one great slab of steak. Cooked medium like requested
column3: juicy and perfect. Service at the bar was incredible. Our waitress knew the menu well
column4: was great at recommending her favorites and popular dishes and knew the details of all the cocktails. We Â also split the Elote Style Corn. Just those two items
column5: and we were stuffed. You start off with bread and service is quick.
